name: Personalized Travel Planning
desc: A machine learning system that analyzes user preferences, budget, and travel history to generate personalized travel itineraries and recommendations. The project demonstrates recommendation algorithms, data analysis, and user preference modeling.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
desc: A classic Tic Tac Toe game built with a clean interface and smooth gameplay. Players take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3×3 grid, with the goal of aligning three in a row. The project demonstrates fundamental programming concepts such as game logic, condition checking, and user interaction.

name: My Personal Portfolio Website
desc: A showcase of my web development and machine learning projects, built to solve problems and spark ideas.A classic Tic Tac Toe game built with a clean interface and smooth gameplay. Players take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3×3 grid, with the goal of aligning three in a row. The project demonstrates fundamental programming concepts such as game logic, condition checking, and user interaction.

name: Pattern Discovery in Alzheimer’s Disease
desc: Pattern Discovery in Alzheimer’s Disease is a research project that applies data analysis and machine learning to uncover hidden trends in patient records, brain imaging, and cognitive assessments. By identifying these patterns, the study aims to improve early diagnosis, track disease progression, and support the development of more effective treatments.A classic Tic Tac Toe game built with a clean interface and smooth gameplay. Players take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3×3 grid, with the goal of aligning three in a row. The project demonstrates fundamental programming concepts such as game logic, condition checking, and user interaction.

name: Spam Email Detection
desc: Spam Email Detection is a machine learning project designed to identify and filter out spam emails from users' inboxes. By utilizing natural language processing and classification algorithms, the system analyzes email content and metadata to distinguish between legitimate messages and spam. This project showcases techniques in data preprocessing, feature extraction, and model evaluation to enhance email security and user experience.

name: Real time Anomaly Detection in streaming Transactions
desc: A real-time anomaly detection system for streaming financial transactions that identifies suspicious patterns instantly. Using machine learning and statistical models, it flags fraudulent activities as they occur, enabling rapid response to threats. The project demonstrates stream processing, anomaly detection algorithms, and real-time data analysis techniques.

name: Talent Connect
desc: *TalentConnect is a skill-first hiring platform that replaces resumes with real work, verified talent, and smart matching—helping students get hired for what they can do and employers hire faster, safer and better
